SETTINGS.MenuHint: Configure settings for the Eventide RP System.
SETTINGS.InitativeFormulaHint: Formula used to calculate initiative in combat. Cannot be empty. Leave empty and save to reset to default.
SETTINGS.InitiativeFormulaReloadPrompt: The initiative formula has been updated. It's recommended to reload the game for this change to fully take effect. Reload now?
SETTINGS.InitiativeDecimalsHint: Number of decimal places to display for initiative values.
SETTINGS.DefaultCharacterTabHint: The tab that will be active by default when opening a character sheet.
SETTINGS.DefaultDiceRollModeHint: The default visibility mode for dice rolls.
SETTINGS.AutoRollNpcInitiativeHint: Automatically roll initiative for NPCs when added to initiative.
SETTINGS.AutoRollPlayerInitiativeHint: Automatically roll initiative for players when added to initiative.
SETTINGS.HideNpcInitiativeRollsHint: Hide the initiative roll results for NPCs from players.
SETTINGS.DefaultCombatRoundDurationHint: Default duration of a combat round in seconds.
SETTINGS.UiThemeHint: Choose a visual theme for the user interface.
SETTINGS.ShowGearEquipMessagesHint: Display chat messages when gear items are equipped or unequipped.
